title: Interpretation of dreams by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: The book Interpretation of Dreams According to Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi, interpretation books are a reference for people who want to know what their dreams that they saw refer to. There are some people who believe that the dream they saw in their dreams and still remember that it is nothing but a message to them telling them something to do, but this is not necessarily true, because sometimes dreams are just reflections of the reality that we live in and today we will discuss the book of dream interpretation by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi. My theory and the interpretation of my dreams. In addition to the presence of hundreds of topics on our website related to different interpretations of dreams. The meaning of crying in a dream There are many things related to dreams. Dreams are strange phenomena that constantly occur to people from the day they were born and continue with them in their lives, and now we will know its effects. Crying in a dream: If crying is in the dream It takes the form of a scream or a slap, then this is evidence of serious sadness that has befallen the dreamer with this dream. If the crying is from fear of God or hearing the Qur’an, then it indicates joy and happiness. Here we have finished our article entitled Interpretation of Dreams by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi, and we provide a direct link to an online application Through it, dreams are interpreted.

title: Interpretation of a dream about talking to a police officer about unmarried women

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing talking to a policeman in a dream about one girl: An unmarried girl who dreams of seeing the police in a dream is one of the unfavorable dreams for her. Here the dream symbolizes that she will fall into a series of problems in her life, and God knows best. The vision could be a sign of psychological suffering in which the dreamer lives alone, And he cannot find a hand to help him in this, and God knows best. As for the only girl who dreams that she is talking to a policeman in a dream, it is a sign that she has a strong personality and that she is fine on her own. It is also a metaphor for the ability of insight to extract her from the oppressor by the rule of law, and God knows best. As the vision shows The girl has an ambitious personality and has many goals that she seeks to achieve in her life. Seeing him in a dream that he is talking to a policeman calmly with one girl. This dream symbolizes the woman’s marriage to a suitable and calm person. As for the policeman who speaks ill of the girl in the dream, this may indicate However, someone causes psychological and nervous harm to the dreamer and is considered one of his relatives, and God knows best. See also: Interpretation of seeing a policeman or officer in a dream and its meaningInterpretation of seeing talking to a policeman in a dream about a married womanThe appearance of the police in a dream for a married woman is a serious sign that she will find great happiness in Her life. It may indicate that her husband may get a high promotion in his workplace, and God knows best. As for seeing the police arresting someone in a dream for a married woman, this symbolizes that there is more than one person waiting for the dreamer and conspiring against her, and God knows best. And the appearance of the police in a woman’s home. Married in a dream. Evidence has confirmed the existence of disputes between the mother and her husband, and God knows best. When a married woman dreams of seeing the police leaving her house in a dream, this dream indicates an end to disagreements and freedom from worry, and God knows best. Seeing a married woman talking to a policeman in a dream. This indicates She is a strong personality and enjoys rationality and logic in raising her children, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing talking with a policeman in a dream about the man and its meaning. When a man dreams of seeing the police in a dream, it is a vision worthy of praise for him. Because it declares that he is a successful man in his work and obtains many good things from God. The man Who dreamed that the police stopped him in a dream, but he managed to escape from them. A good vision because it symbolizes that the dreamer has a strong personality, endures hardships and overcomes all problems and obstacles in his life, and God knows best. As for seeing the police chasing a man in a dream, it is a sign that he will go through a difficult period. Full of problems, but God Almighty helps him solve them. Seeing and talking to the police in a dream about a married man. A sign that the dreamer will face a problem with his wife, but it will be solved in a short time, and God knows best. Read also: Interpretation of a dream about my husband being arrested by the police. Meaning of seeing talking with a police officer In a pregnant woman’s dream and its interpretation: When a pregnant woman sees the police in a dream, this is a sign of the approaching date and the ease of childbirth, God willing. As for seeing the police entering a pregnant woman’s house in a dream, it symbolizes the great fear that the dreamer feels about childbirth, and God knows best. Seeing scenes of a policeman

title: Buying grape leaves in a dream

preview.html: In this article from our website, we will discuss different interpretations of this vision from the point of view of some scholars, and in the case of single women, men, pregnant women, young men, and divorced women. The interpretation of seeing grape leaves in a dream for one girl: If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is buying grape leaves to cook for her. The vision is praiseworthy, Because it indicates the strength of the girl’s personality, and the correctness of her decisions. She is also a strong girl who helps others make important decisions in their lives. As for seeing an unmarried girl in a dream, she is buying grape leaves from someone she knows. The vision indicated that he will make a decision in her favor regarding her marriage. The vision indicates This girl will face many difficulties in choosing her life partner. Seeing an unmarried girl in a dream buying fresh grape leaves is evidence of her psychological stability. The evidence is that she is experiencing an emotional stage that makes her experience a feeling of happiness. Seeing an unmarried girl in a dream buying rotten grape leaves and zeppelin. An unpleasant vision, because it portends bad luck with others. She will not enjoy a good relationship with her friends. See also: Interpretation of seeing black grapes in a dream. Interpretation of seeing buying grape leaves in a dream for a married woman. Seeing a married woman in a dream while buying fresh grape leaves is evidence of an abundance of supplies. And evidence On the abundance of good deeds, money and livelihood. Seeing a married woman in a dream buying fresh grape leaves. It means an abundance of good offspring and may God grant her health among her children. Seeing in a dream a married woman buying grape leaves but they are spoiled. It is evidence of her weakness and inability to control the upbringing of her child. The vision shows that she She does not give her children enough care, tenderness and love. A married woman buys grape leaves in a dream and then prepares them to eat with her children. Evidence that family members enjoy health and peace of mind. Evidence of her desire for her children to eat healthy foods. A married woman buys grape leaves from the farm in Dream. The vision means that a lot of money will come in the coming days from a halal source. Grape leaves in a dream for a married woman, with their delicious taste, indicate safety and psychological comfort. Grape leaves have a delicious taste in a dream for a married woman, evidence of the existence of a family bond. Interpretation of a dream Buying grape leaves for a man and its meaning Seeing a man in a dream eating delicious grape leaves is good news for a broad and very good diet. Eating grape leaves in a man’s dream indicates a lot of money that will come to him soon. If the dreaming man is sick, then grape leaves indicate Healing from illness. Seeing a man in a dream eating grape leaves, this is good news for good and happy days. He will also make money in his trade and get rid of the problems he faces. Rotten grape leaves in a dream for a married man who falls into debt. A married man who buys grape leaves in a dream for his wife It is good news of blessings and abundance of food. Eating grape leaves in a dream for a man, but they are not delicious, portends financial loss and heavy debts. Eating delicious grape leaves in a dream for a man is good news for obtaining a bitter status.

title: Interpretation of a dream about changing hair color in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about changing hair color in a dream, there are many different dreams that a person sees in them, which raises curiosity to know whether they include interpretations, meanings, and interpretations hoped for for the dreamer, or whether they are dreams that are not good, as they carry unexpected meanings and repercussions, and many have worked Interpreters, such as Ibn Sirin, work hard to clarify these meanings, and in this article we will explain to you the interpretation of the dream of changing hair color in a dream, which varies depending on the social status of the viewer. Interpretation of the dream of changing hair color in a dream It is also one of the visions that is repeated in the dreams of many individuals, It is considered confusing, whether it is a good vision or one of the unpleasant visions, and many translators have tried to clarify its meanings and connotations, and in this context we present to you the interpretation of a dream about the color of hair that changed in the dream, which is: According to what the scholar Ibn Sirin said, seeing hair dye in a dream. Did you see hair dye in a dream? Is it a sign of decoration or is it an attempt to hide things? In addition, seeing hair dye in a dream is evidence of goodness and happiness if the sight is not ugly. Also, anyone who dreams of changing the color of her hair indicates that many positive changes will occur in her life. It also indicates that she will begin a new phase in her life, in which she will gain comfort and pleasure. Whoever sees that in a dream he dyes his hair white or gray, it appears that he is hiding his poverty and loss. See also: The interpretation of seeing olive branches in a dream for single and married women in detail. The interpretation of seeing hair dye for a married woman, of course, varies. Interpretations included in dreams of dyeing hair based on the color of hair visible in the dream, which has been interpreted by many dream interpreters, and in this context we take into account the interpretation of a dream of dyeing hair for a married woman. Who is he for: If a married woman dreams that she is dyeing her hair. This dream indicates that she will hear happy news and is preparing for a happy occasion. But if a married woman sees in a dream that she has dyed her hair crimson red. This dream is evidence that her husband loves her. In addition In addition, if a married woman sees in a dream that she is dyeing her hair, this indicates that good things will come. See also: Playing the flute in a dream by Ibn Sirin in detail for unmarried women. Interpretation of a dream about dyeing gray hair in a dream by Ibn Sirin. It has also been clarified that this dream includes interpretations The meanings and interpretations are often good and good and differ based on those details that you see in the dream, and in this paragraph we present to you the interpretation of the dream of dyeing gray hair in a dream by Ibn Sirin, which is: If someone sees in a dream that he is dyeing his hair gray. This dream is a sign and good news about... Longevity and long life. In addition, hair dye appears with gray hair. It may be evidence of good conditions for the visions. It also indicates great knowledge that must be acquired. Seeing this dream is also evidence that the dreamer will obtain a new promotion at work, and God is Most High And he knows that. See also: Interpretation of a solution

title: Interpretation of a dream about a dove: You see a dove in a dream

preview.html: The dove in a dream by Ibn SirinInterpretation of a dream about pigeons by Ibn SirinInterpretation of a dream about slaughtering pigeonsInterpretation of a dream about pigeon eggsInterpretation of a dream about a dove for a single womanThe presence of pigeons in the windowDove in a dreamInterpretation of seeing pigeons in a dream for a pregnant womanPigeons in a dream are among the beautiful dreams that we constantly see in our dreams, and a person does not realize the difference between them and pigeons, which makes Its interpretation is relatively difficult compared to other interpretations, as pigeons are one of the types of birds that are found in public life to a very large extent and somewhat resemble pigeons. They are large in size and are among the birds that are difficult to reproduce at home easily, unlike pigeons or others. We will give you complete explanations. And it is clear to the translator Ibn Sirin, in his interpretations of seeing pigeons in a dream, which the dreamer must know correctly in order to fully know the signs of the dream.Interpretation of pigeons in a dreamSeeing pigeons in dreams as they mate and build their nests indicates the calm of the world and happy homes where children surrender obediently and compassionately. It dominates everyone. If you hear the cry of a lone dove in a dream, it portends pain and disappointment through the death of one of those you seek to help, and it often portends the death of the father. If you see a dead dove, this is a bad omen of the separation of the spouses, either through death or disbelief. If you see a white dove This indicates abundant crops and blind trust in the faith of friends. If you see a flock of white doves in your dream, this indicates security, innocent happiness and lucky developments in the future. If a dove carries a message for you, this includes news of a happy nature from an absent friend, because It indicates a reconciliation between lovers. But if the dove looks exhausted, a tone of sadness will dominate the reconciliation, or happy news can give a tone of sadness through the mention of a helpless friend. If the business message is followed by a small coupon. But if you dream of a letter, this portends that you are doomed, a fatal illness will affect you or one of your relatives that can cause you financial ruin. Interpretation of a pigeon in a dream for a young manSeeing a pigeon in a dream to obtain a bachelor’s degree in a dream is evidence that you will find a job opportunity New things in the near future. Pigeons in a dream are evidence of brilliant success in the dreamer’s life. Feeding pigeons in a dream is evidence of the marriage of a single person. Seeing pigeons in the house in a dream is a sign of new changes coming to the dreamer. Interpretation of pigeons in a dream for a married woman: Seeing a married woman feeding pigeons In a dream, it is evidence of concern for her husband and children. Seeing a married woman of a dove standing on her husband’s head in a dream means that she will get a very good business opportunity from which she will make profits. Seeing a dove in a dream for a married woman is an indication of the abundant goodness that she will receive. A woman who Seeing a flock of pigeons hovering over her house in a dream is evidence of kindness, livelihood, and money that she will receive. Seeing pigeon eggs in a dream is evidence of a pregnant woman who will marry soon. Woman

title: What is the interpretation of seeing a whole lamb cage in a dream?

preview.html: The Trend website provides you with the complete interpretation of seeing pregnancy intestines in a dream. It is known as sheep intestines or intestines. It's one of the things that many people tell about in some people's dreams. Therefore, we present to you, dear followers, all the special meanings and evidence to know what is the evidence for seeing the intestines of an animal in a complete dream, as well as the meanings of seeing the intestines of an animal in a complete dream. Or eating it, selling it, or even disposing of it, as we have collected for you the interpretation of eating a lamb’s intestines in a complete dream for a pregnant woman. Books by distinguished scholars in interpreting dreams and calamities. Visions. Seeing the intestines of an animal in a dream in full. The interpretation of seeing the intestines of a complete lamb in a dream is a sign of goodness, great power, and gaining the highest positions in the dreamer’s life. Also, seeing the intestines of animals in a dream in full is a sign that the dreamer will move to a new life that is better than before. It indicates Seeing the whole intestines of an animal in a dream indicates the problems and dangers that the dreamer will face during this period. If eating the intestines of animals in the dream is whole and it is for a sick person, this indicates that God will heal him from his illness and relieve him of his distress. Seeing the intestines of animals in a dream is one of the desired visions and a sign On a new, calm and stable life. Seeing the complete intestines of a sheep being cleaned in a dream. The interpretation of seeing a sheep’s intestines being cleaned in a dream is a complete indication of removing some friends and getting rid of them. Also, seeing a person’s entire intestines in a dream is one of the unpleasant visions and a sign of a serious illness. Also, seeing a person’s entire intestines in a dream is one of the unpleasant visions and a sign of a serious illness. Seeing the intestines of animals being removed in order to cook and eat them is evidence of the hardship of life. Seeing him eating the intestines of a lamb, which is an intention in a dream, is a sign of calamities, disasters, and extreme poverty. Interpretation of eating lamb intestines in a dream is complete. Seeing a whole intestines in a dream means that the money that the person saves will come out. , or one of his grandchildren will appear with a black face. If a man eats a whole intestine in a dream, this means that he will spend a lot of his money during this period of his life. A dream about eating other people’s intestines indicates that a person will receive some money that others have saved. Seeing intestines coming out of the stomach or washing The abdomen with the intestines returning to the abdomen or not returning is a clear indication of approaching death. The complete interpretation of eating a lamb’s belly in a dream for a pregnant woman. The interpretation of seeing a pregnant woman’s entire uterus in a dream is evidence that she will undergo childbirth, which will be empty and still. Also, seeing a lamb eating A whole sheep’s belly in a dream indicates that she will soon give birth to a male child. title: What is the interpretation of seeing ants in a dream according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Seeing ants in a dream for a married woman: Seeing ants is one of the visions whose connotations are related to the details and situations that the fortuneteller sees in his dream, and its interpretation relates to the situation of the fortuneteller himself, and the cases of ants for married women in more detail and explanation. Seeing ants in a dream for a married woman Ants for a married woman indicates that life is moving on and she is planning a trip in In the near future, she will reap many fruits and benefits from it. If she sees ants leaving her house, this is an indication of what she is missing in the house, either because someone is traveling or because her time is approaching. But if she sees a large ant leaving her house, then this is the thief who robs her of what she needs, and the flying ant. It indicates travel and movement from one place to another. But if you see black ants, this indicates large offspring and a large number of children, and killing ants is interpreted as an early miscarriage or failure to achieve a planned goal or goal, and if ants are in the body, this expresses the closest term. Or a serious illness. Seeing ants in a dream for a married woman according to Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin believes that ants are a people defeated by weakness and humiliation. In other places, ants symbolize the army if it is large, and it is evidence of livelihood if it enters the house. Because ants do not live in a place where they do not exist. Good or food, and if they enter the house with food, this is a lot of goodness and blessing. For the sick, ants are evidence of the end of life and the near term, and their frequent presence expresses kinship, ties, and social relationships, as it symbolizes the followed system and walking according to established rules and pillars, and the emergence of ants from whose hole shows worry and worry. Whoever sees that he understands the words of ants, this indicates the guardianship, authority, and high status of the story of our Master Solomon, peace be upon him. Seeing ants in a dream for a pregnant woman. Seeing ants expresses the imminence of childbirth and facilitates it, as a way out of adversity and adversity, to overcome the difficulties of pregnancy and the pain of childbirth, and if the ants are white, this indicates On the birth of a female. If the ants are black, this indicates the birth of a male, and God knows best what is in the wombs. The abundance of ants indicates long offspring and good offspring, and an increase in worldly comfort and abundance of life. And if she sees ants stinging her, this indicates recovery from a fur disease. And restoring health, getting rid of worries and heavy burdens, and returning water to its normal course, if the sting does not hurt. What is the interpretation of seeing red ants in a dream for a married woman? Red ants symbolize the need to monitor children from time to time, monitor their behavior, correct mistakes, and correct aspects Palaces and palaces. Whoever sees red ants, this may be envy or magic from a weak and helpless people, and escaping from these ants is evidence of escaping from hatred and deception. If red ants fly, this is an arduous journey, moving from one place to another or migrating in search of livelihoods, opportunities, and improvement. Income level. Seeing ants in a dream for a married woman on her body. If the ants are walking on the body, this indicates the approaching term, especially for the sick. If the ants cover the entire body, this symbolizes a short life or death.

title: What is Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing a black wolf in a dream?

preview.html: A black wolf in a dream. Some people may see a black wolf during their sleep, and it is natural for a person to feel a state of panic and fear after seeing this dream, as they are the most ferocious type of wolves, and many of them look forward to searching for an interpretation of this vision in the dream, which the jurists relied upon when Interpreting the fortuneteller’s position, we also explain the interpretation of seeing a wolf attack and the meaning of its bite. A black wolf in a dream. What is the interpretation of a black wolf in a dream? Dream interpretation scholars have agreed that seeing a black wolf in a dream is an unpleasant vision. It is an indication of the presence of an unjust person and a hypocritical and deceitful friend in the life of The dreamer, while his presence inside the dreamer's house is so. A sign that the house will be attacked and robbed in the coming days. Seeing a black wolf transforming into a human form in a dream indicates that the thief will withdraw from the path of corruption and ask God Almighty for forgiveness. Whoever sees in his dream that there is a black wolf protecting a small dog, this indicates that The dreamer adopts a child, but his offspring will return to a thief father, and the dreamer will actually steal from his hands. From that child and he loses his money. Running after the dreamer and chasing him is a sign that there is an evil person near him who is monitoring his life and is jealous of him and wants to cause him a lot of trouble. The bite of a black wolf in a dream is evidence of evil words and harmful gossip that the dreamer’s enemies repeat in his absence. What is the interpretation? A black wolf in a dream according to Ibn Sirin? According to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation, seeing a black wolf in a dream is generally an annoying dream that does not portend good, because it indicates obstacles and difficulties that will stand in the dreamer’s way. Seeing it is a sign of deception, lies, and deception to which the dreamer is exposed The hand of people who show him kindness and love and those who stand behind him. Eating the meat of a black wolf in a dream has two different meanings, one is good and the other is bad. And soon his opponents will do so and the matter will get worse and he will have to pay attention. The vision can also indicate the dreamer’s bad morals, tarnishing his reputation, and divulging someone else’s secrets. Raising black wolves is a sign that the dreamer will adopt a child, but will wrong him in the future. The dream also carries another indication, which is that he will repent soon. A black wolf in a dream for a single woman. When an unmarried woman sees a black wolf in a dream, this is an ominous matter for her, because it is an indication that there is a young man in her life who is deceiving her with sweet and sweet words with which he turns away his wrong intention. Whoever sees that there is a black wolf attacking her in a dream and biting her, this is an indication that she will soon fall into a major dispute between her and one of her relatives in reality. The entry of a black wolf into a bachelor’s house is a sign of a girl entering her life and approaching her for the sake of friendship, but she wants to steal her. Away. A black wolf in a married woman’s dream. A black wolf in a married woman’s dream symbolizes the presence of a corrupt man who wants to get close to her and deceive her in the name of love, but wants to harm her and destroy her marital relationship for nefarious purposes within himself. A black wolf entering a married woman’s home is a sign of home theft. And destroy a neighborhood

title: Interpretation of a dream about strange animals in a dream

preview.html: Animals sometimes attract our attention a lot and appear in a dream, expressing many important things that can be good or bad depending on the interpretation of the vision and the dreamer himself, so we will explain in detail the interpretation of seeing strange animals in a dream to the scholar Ibn Sirin through the following lines. Interpretation of seeing strange animals in a dream By Ibn Sirin Respected scholar Ibn Sirin believes that seeing strange animals in a dream could be a warning about a specific thing that will happen in the dreamer's life. This interpretation varies depending on the color of the animal itself. The most important interpretations about this matter are as follows: A strange, yellow-colored animal indicates the dreamer’s illness in reality. But if the animal in the dream is red, this indicates the approaching marriage, if the dreamer is single. Whoever sees an animal making a strange and annoying sound is a sign that He will hear bad news in the coming period. But if the sound of an animal is desirable in the dream, then this is a sign of the approaching of happy news, God willing. Interpretation of seeing strange animals in a dream for a single woman. Strange animals in a dream for an unmarried woman indicate her life and the events that occur in it, and this varies. Each story differs, and among the most important interpretations of it are the following: A girl who has never been married sees strange animals in her dream, which indicates that she is a very careless person and is spending money in the wrong place. If a single woman sees an animal such as a dog flying unusually, this is a sign of... Dreams that you want to come true in reality. Seeing a lonely cat flying in a dream means that the sadness she feels will end soon. If an unmarried woman sees in her dream that the animal that was born is in the ovulation phase, this is a sign that she will receive a lot of money in the next period of her life. It indicates An unmarried woman seeing a cat without a tail indicates that her life will change a lot in the coming period of her life. Interpretation of strange animals in a married dream: Strange or wild animals in a married dream are evidence of her life in general, and among the most important elements related to it are the following: If a woman sees in her dream a frog A stranger is trying to jump higher, this is a sign of her dreams that she wants to come true. If a married woman sees a strange animal following her during her sleep, this means people speaking about her in objectionable terms. A married woman seeing animals that have disappeared for a long time indicates the stress and tension that the dreamer feels Right now. If a married woman dreams that she is being chased by a strange insect, this means that someone is always trying to harm her or a member of her family. But if she sees that she is killing the insect in a dream and getting rid of it, this indicates her survival from the danger to which she would have been exposed. Interpretation of seeing strange animals in a pregnant woman’s dream: A pregnant woman is going through a very difficult period in her life, and this can be reflected in her dreams as a result of the stress associated with pregnancy. She can see strange things in a dream, but sometimes the following things appear: Seeing a pregnant woman from an animal.

title: The 7 most famous interpretations of seeing a snake in a dream suggest an enemy

preview.html: What is the interpretation of the vision and refusal to kill and mood? A sign of victory over enemies. The meaning of seeing a girl in a vivid dream of climbing in a high place? It indicates joy and pleasure. What is the interpretation of the vision that the oracle was able to control the snake? Items for a lot of money. Meaning Seeing a snake flying? Evidence that the person who sees it will be able to get rid of enemies. Interpretation of seeing a large number of snakes in a man’s dream? Evidence of the presence of many enemies in the life of the group. Interpretation of a dream by Ibn Sirin. Seeing killing a snake and getting rid of it in a dream is a sign of victory. On the enemies. Then if a person sees in a dream that a snake is attacking him, this indicates the victory of the enemy. The snake often indicates the presence of enemies. Then, if the snake bites the snake in the dream, this is evidence of the enemies’ ability to do so. If a person sees in a dream that Speaking sweet words to a snake, this is evidence of people’s love for him. Seeing Nabulsi’s dream If the oracle is able to control the snake in a dream, this is evidence of a lot of money. Then seeing a snake burning in a dream is evidence of the end of all troubles and problems. Then seeing a snake Fly is evidence that the dreamer will be able to get rid of enemies. The white color in a dream shows the blessing and salvation of enemies. So, seeing snake skin in a dream is a sign of money and influence. Then, seeing an oracle swallowing a snake in a dream is a sign of victory Power and getting a new job. Interpretation of a dream about a man’s life. Seeing a large number of snakes in a man’s dream indicates the presence of many enemies in the dreamer’s life. A snake in a dream is evidence of the presence of many enemies in a house. This is a revelation. Then seeing a living man in a dream and he was in the house. Sick, this indicates the approach of his death and the seriousness of the disease. Then seeing a large number of snakes in a dream in different shapes, and this indicates envy, problems and concerns. Seeing a single woman’s dream: Seeing a girl alive in a dream rising to a high place, this indicates joy and pleasure. Then Seeing the golden skin of gold is evidence of the money that this girl will receive. Then seeing a single woman in a dream that she is facing a snake in a dream is evidence of the absolution of enemies. If a girl sees that a live animal is growing in the house and it is a pet, this is a sign of salvation Of the problems and suffering that she goes through. Interpretation of a married woman’s dream: Seeing a married woman in a dream who is afraid of a snake is a sign of dealing with problems without tension and fear. Then seeing a snake fighting in a dream and killing it is evidence of being exempt from problems and enemies. If a married woman sees that she is talking to a snake in a dream This indicates wealth and a lot of money. Hence, seeing snake eggs in a dream is evidence of the presence of evil people in a woman’s life and she must take care of them. Joy in a dream. See grilled fish. Shrimps in a dream. Lentils in a dream. Seeing raw fish. Suicide in a dream. Vomiting in a dream. Feces in a dream. Appointment in a dream. Snake in a dream. Someone you love. Several times
